data.comment: The match has started at Chuncheon Songam Sports Town.
Dong Jun Lee awards Gangwon a goal kick.
In the minute 2, Seongnam awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball safe as Gangwon is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Dong Jun Lee signals a Seongnam throw-in in Gangwon's half.
In the minute 4, Can Seongnam get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Gangwon's half?
Gangwon have a goal kick.
Dong Jun Lee signals a free kick to Seongnam in their own half.
In the minute 9, Seongnam awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Gangwon in their own half.
Dong Jun Lee signals a free kick to Gangwon.
In the minute 11, Goal kick for Seongnam at Chuncheon Songam Sports Town.
Throw-in Seongnam.
Throw-in for Seongnam in the half of Gangwon.
In the minute 15, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Gangwon to take a throw-in in Seongnam territory.
Free kick for Seongnam in the half of Gangwon.
In the minute 19, Gangwon have been awarded a corner by Dong Jun Lee.
Lee Hyeon-sik gets his shot on target but fails to score for Gangwon.
Seongnam awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 23, Ball goes out of play for a Gangwon goal kick.
Gangwon's Lee Yeong-jae is on target but unsuccessful.
In Chuncheon a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 26, In Chuncheon Gangwon drive forward through Ko Mu-yeol. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Seongnam are down to 10 men after Park Su-il has been shown a red card.
Ko Mu-yeol is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
In the minute 33, Corner awarded to Gangwon.
Dong Jun Lee awards the away team a throw-in.
Ko Mu-yeol returns to the field for Gangwon after picking up a slight injury.
In the minute 33, Free kick Seongnam.
Throw-in for Seongnam at Chuncheon Songam Sports Town.
Corner awarded to Gangwon.
In the minute 39, Lee Yeong-jae of Gangwon gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Chuncheon.
Throw-in for Gangwon in their own half.
In the minute 42, Gangwon's Lee Yeong-jae misses with an attempt on goal.
Seongnam have a goal kick.
Seongnam awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 44, Seongnam have been awarded a corner by Dong Jun Lee.
Dong Jun Lee signals a free kick to Seongnam.
The 1st half is prolonged by 3 minutes of added time.
In the minute 45, Gangwon have been awarded a corner by Dong Jun Lee.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Chuncheon.
The first-half is over.
In the minute 46, The second-half is now underway.
In the minute 46, Goal kick for Seongnam at Chuncheon Songam Sports Town.
Nam Il Kim is making the team's first substitution at Chuncheon Songam Sports Town with Kim Hyeon-seong replacing Yang Dong-hyeon.
Kim Seung-dae is on a sub for Ko Mu-yeol for Gangwon.
Dong Jun Lee signals a Gangwon throw-in in Seongnam's half.
Throw-in high up the field for Gangwon in Chuncheon.
In the minute 50, Corner awarded to Gangwon.
Im Chai-min (Gangwon) gets in a shot â€“ but hits the bar! Ohhhh so close.
Corner awarded to Gangwon.
In the minute 51, Ball goes out of play for a Gangwon goal kick.
Gangwon's Lee Yeong-jae misses with an attempt on goal.
Dong Jun Lee awards Seongnam a goal kick.
In the minute 52, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Gangwon to take a throw-in in Seongnam territory.
Lee Ho-in for Gangwon gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 53, Goal kick for Seongnam at Chuncheon Songam Sports Town.
Im Seung-kyeom is replacing Park Tae-jun for Seongnam at Chuncheon Songam Sports Town.
In Chuncheon a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 55, Goal! Seongnam have got their heads in front thanks to a Na Sangho strike.
Lee Chang-yong instrumental with a fine assist.
Ball goes out of play for a Seongnam goal kick.
In the minute 59, Free kick for Gangwon in the half of Seongnam.
Can Gangwon capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Dong Jun Lee awards Seongnam a goal kick.
In the minute 61, Can Seongnam get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Gangwon's half?
Can Gangwon get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Seongnam's half?
Free kick for Seongnam in their own half.
In the minute 67, Dong Jun Lee signals a free kick to Gangwon in their own half.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Gangwon close to the penalty box.
Byung-Soo Kim (Gangwon) is making a second substitution, with Jeong Ji-yong replacing Lee Ho-in.
In the minute 72, Seongnam have a goal kick.
Gangwon to take a throw-in in Seongnam territory.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Chuncheon.
In the minute 74, Throw-in for Gangwon at Chuncheon Songam Sports Town.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Goal kick for Seongnam at Chuncheon Songam Sports Town.
In the minute 76, Throw-in for Gangwon in the half of Seongnam.
Seongnam have a goal kick.
Ball safe as Gangwon is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 78, Throw-in for Gangwon close to the penalty box.
Dong Jun Lee signals a Gangwon throw-in in Seongnam's half.
Free kick Gangwon.
In the minute 79, At Chuncheon Songam Sports Town, Kim Dong-hyeon has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Kim Yeong-bin is on target to level the scores at 1-1.
Dong Jun Lee awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 84, Free kick for Seongnam in their own half.
Seongnam push upfield but Dong Jun Lee quickly pulls them for offside.
Seongnam needs to be cautious. Gangwon have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 88, Gangwon have been awarded a corner by Dong Jun Lee.
Im Chai-min heads in to make it 2-1 at Chuncheon Songam Sports Town.
Great play from Lee Yeong-jae to set up the goal.
Gangwon have been awarded a corner by Dong Jun Lee.
Dong Jun Lee signals a free kick to Seongnam in their own half.
The fourth official's board shows 3 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Ball goes out of play for a Gangwon goal kick.
Dong Jun Lee awards Seongnam a goal kick.
Dong Jun Lee signals a throw-in for Gangwon, close to Seongnam's area.
Can Gangwon capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Seongnam's half?
Dong Jun Lee blows to end the match. The final score is 2-1.
Yu In-soo is replacing Choi Ji-moog for the away team.
Lee Yeong-jae is booked for the home team.
